social_relation: Tom is a subordinate and Sarah is his superior
scenario: Weekly project update meeting in the office
goal: Tom wants to update Sarah on his progress and highlight any roadblocks he's facing
information: Current status of bug fixes for version 2.1; issues faced with integrating third-party API; estimated timeline for completing remaining tasks;
information_type: project status; encountered issues; timeline estimates;
common_norms: Professional communication should be maintained during updates; honesty about challenges faced while providing realistic timelines;
